mapper.insert: insert into transaction(user_id, account, type, sort, year, month, day, create_time, beizhu, location, way) values (#{userId}, #{account}, #{type}, #{sort}, #{year}, #{month}, #{day}, #{createTime}, #{beizhu}, #{location}, #{way})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, account, type, sort, year, month, day, create_time, beizhu, way, location from transaction where user_id = #{tp} order by create_time desc
select user_id, account, type, sort, year, month, day, create_time, beizhu, way, location from transaction
select sum(account) from transaction where user_id = 1
select sum(account) from transaction where user_id = 0
mapper.update: update transaction set user_id=#{userId}, account=#{account}, type=#{type}, sort=#{sort}, year=#{year}, month=#{month}, day=#{day}, create_time=#{createTime}, beizhu=#{beizhu}, way=#{way}, location=#{location} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
